```{r}
#predict the age of the dog (y) if you know the boro (x1) and gender (x2) and breed (x3)

#change breed_name to a factor rather than a character varialbe

#create reference groups that are coded as 0
distinct_dogz_reg = 
  distinct_dogz %>% 
  mutate(
    borough = fct_infreq(borough),
    animal_gender = fct_infreq(animal_gender)
    
    )

fit = lm(dog_age ~ borough + breed_name + animal_gender, data = distinct_dogz)


```
